Import packages
```{r}
packages = c('ggplot2','dplyr','readr', 'gganimate', 'lubridate','animation','stringr')

for (p in packages){
  if(!require(p, character.only = T)){
    install.packages(p)
  }
  library(p,character.only = T)
}

```

LoadData
```{r}
population_data_10_19 <- read_csv("../Data/Residential_Planning/respopagesextod2011to2019.csv")

Population_by_PA <- population_data_10_19 %>%
  group_by(Time,PA, AG)%>%
  summarise(Pop_total = sum(Pop)) %>%
  filter(AG == "0_to_4")

Population_by_PA$Year <- year(mdy(Population_by_PA$Time))

Population_by_PA
```

```{r}
ggplot(Population_by_PA,
       aes(x = reorder(PA, Pop_total), y = Pop_total, color = PA)) +
  geom_point(stat = 'identity', size = 5) +
  geom_segment(aes(
    y=100,
    x = PA,
    yend = Pop_total,
    xend = PA)
  )+
  coord_flip() +
  labs(title = "Year: {frame_time}") +
  theme(legend.position = "none") + 
  transition_time(Year)+
  ease_aes("linear")
```
